name: Behemoth Escape
description:
Behemoth Escape

Test your wits with this single-player escape room. Find clues and hints, solve puzzles and escape the Future Corp building.

This 45 minute escape room is sure to test your puzzle solving skills, discover the truth about the creation of the behemoths and the dastardly experiments Future Corp was conducting.

Check out more from me, and find me on Twitter: @Josiro98
